Name: HopDodge
About the game: Key Features: Top Down AND 3D platforming Hop around on the back plane as Hop OR Jump and weave in the 3D platforming mode as Dodge 30+ Base Levels to play through Solve puzzles, Avoid traps and obstacles, and explore 50+ different challenging levels Create and Share your own levels Using an in-game editor, build levels and contraptions to your heart's desire then share those creations online using Steam Workshop. Free content updates and features planned Updates and features are planned for development and will be released as time goes on.
